divs: Sighting Detailswatching TV when alerted by daughter a UFO come quick. Wife daughter myself went outside to view. Plane as day we saw it in SE sky moving NE a different speeds and a couple hovers it appeared to move how ever it wanted with no effort. A small single engine plane was in area close to object. we watch as it stop for a long moment then with in a split second you could see what appeared that it was going straight up then vanished. New it was a UFO. I had seen almost the same thing in 1974 in area about 60 miles from here on same type starlit night, had never thought much of seeing something like this. a 3rd daughter was at a friends house, had wife go pick her up right away. FLABBERGASTED
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Swartz Creek
There were no other sightings in Swartz Creek on or around March 29th 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: daughter alerted wife,myelf to object in se moving ne orangish glow flying differnt speeds
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
